messageBody:
how to test servlets?
Try http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/ or httpunit or MockObjects.

Hi ,
I hava recently started working on JUnit. Presently, I have tested a session bean which calls the entity bean. My workflow is as follows:

       
        Presentation --------->  Controller --------->     Session--------------------->Entity---------------------> Database

        JSP CODE                 Servlet                                Bean                      Bean
                                                (How to test?)  (Used Test Code)               

I have tested the Session bean sucessfully, which means that I also test the Entity, Now the problem is how to test the controller servlet, or rather, how to test the servlets?

Also I am not confused whether I am on the correct path or not.
